statements: REVOKE SELECT ON Banking_Accounts FROM public
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON accounts TO user1;
REVOKE SELECT, DELETE ON transactions TO user2;
REVOKE ALL ON accounts, transactions TO user3;
REVOKE SELECT ON customers FROM public
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON accounts FROM public
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON transactions FROM public
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON Customers FROM user1;
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT ON Accounts FROM user2;
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON Transactions FROM user3;
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON customers FROM user1;
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON accounts FROM user2;
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON transactions FROM user3;
